title: NCLT allows KSK Mahanadi lenders to distribute surplus cash of Rs 6400 crore among them
description: This is the first time lenders will recover a part of their dues before a resolution is approved by the NCLT. All bidders including Adani Power, the highest bidder offering Rs 27000 crore, may want to relook at their respective offers following the NCLT order.
